en.bdb: Hearing the words of Amit Singh, Krishna was highly enraged and said, “O Amit Singh! I shall now destroy your body and make you lifeless.”1252.

verse.gurmukhi: bwlk ho Aru juD pRbIn ho mwgu kCU muiK jo jIX DwirE ]
verse.unicode: ਬਾਲਕ ਹੋ ਅਰੁ ਜੁਧ ਪ੍ਰਬੀਨ ਹੋ ਮਾਗੁ ਕਛੂ ਮੁਖਿ ਜੋ ਜੀਯ ਧਾਰਿਓ ॥

en.bdb: When Krishna fought for two Pahars (about six hours), the enemy Amit Singh got pleased and said, “O Krishna! although you are still a child, but you are skillful in warfare, you may ask for whatever you want.”

ss.gurmukhi: (BwvyW) bwlk hYN, pr Xu`D ivc pRbIn hYN, jo mn ivc DwirAw hovy, auh mUMhoN mMg lY।
ss.unicode: (ਭਾਵੇਾਂ) ਬਾਲਕ ਹੈਂ, ਪਰ ਯੁੱਧ ਵਿਚ ਪ੍ਰਬੀਨ ਹੈਂ, ਜੋ ਮਨ ਵਿਚ ਧਾਰਿਆ ਹੋਵੇ, ਉਹ ਮੂੰਹੋਂ ਮੰਗ ਲੈ।

bdb.gurmukhi: (BwvyW) bwlk hYN, pr Xu`D ivc pRbIn hYN, jo mn ivc DwirAw hovy, auh mUMhoN mMg lY।

transliteration.en: baalak ho ar judh prabeen ho maag kachhoo mukh jo jeey dhaario ||

transliteration.ipa: bɑlək hɔ ər d͡ʒʊt̪ə̀ pɹəbin hɔ mɑG kəɕu mʊkʰ d͡ʒɔ d͡ʒij t̪ɑrɪo.
transliteration.ur: بالک هو ار جُدھ پربیٍن هو ماگ کچھُو مُکھ جو جیِے دھاراو ۔۔

en.bdb: Krishna said, “Tell me the manner of your death.” Then Amit Singh said, “No one can kill me from the front.” Then Krishna struck a blow on him behind.1253.

ss.gurmukhi: (aus ny ikhw) mYnUM swhmixEW ho ky koeI vI mwr nhIN skdw। qd qlvwr lY ky ikRSn ny ipCly pwsy qoN vwr kr id`qw ]1253]

en.bdb: The head of Amit Singh was cut, but still he ran and moved forward and he struck a dreadful blow on an elephant of the army

transliteration.hindi: मारि करी हनि बीर चलिओ असि लै करि स्री हरि ओरि पधारिओ ॥

en.bdb: His head fell down on the ground, which was given a place of Meru by Shiva in his rosary of skulls.1254.

ss.gurmukhi: isr DrqI auqy ifg ipAw, (qw) sRI iSv ny lY ky muMf mwlw ivc guMd ky, (aus nUM) 'myru' (ArQwq auprlw mxkw) bxw id`qw ]1254]
ss.unicode: ਸਿਰ ਧਰਤੀ ਉਤੇ ਡਿਗ ਪਿਆ, (ਤਾ) ਸ੍ਰੀ ਸ਼ਿਵ ਨੇ ਲੈ ਕੇ ਮੁੰਡ ਮਾਲਾ ਵਿਚ ਗੁੰਦ ਕੇ, (ਉਸ ਨੂੰ) 'ਮੇਰੁ' (ਅਰਥਾਤ ਉਪਰਲਾ ਮਣਕਾ) ਬਣਾ ਦਿੱਤਾ ॥੧੨੫੪॥
